attributes.action: Criminals forgo right to appeal for Conspiracy to Murder/Robbery Convictions
attributes.additional_details:
There should be no access route to the  criminal appeal system for reduced jail sentences for convictions for 'Conspiracy to Murder' or ' Conspiracy to Rob'.

Not only does this cause unwelcome stress to the victim(s)  but this is a shameful waste of taxpayers money.

The original tariff should be upheld in all but the most exceptional circumstances.
